account_id.description: Microsoft account ID used for the mailbox query.

folder.description: Well-known mail folder name; defaults to inbox when omitted.

folder_id.description: Explicit folder identifier; takes precedence over folder name when provided.

limit.description: Maximum number of messages to return (1-200).

include_body.description: Whether to include message body content in results.

use_cache.description: Whether cached results may be used if available.

force_refresh.description: Bypass cache and always fetch fresh results when true.
